Package index

All functions

activate()
Determine the context of subsequent manipulations
align_dendro()
Dendrogram plot
align_gg() ggalign()
Create ggplot object in the layout
align_group()
Group layout axis into panels
align_kmeans()
Group layout observations by kmeans
align_panels() ggpanels()
Create ggplot object in the layout panels
align_reorder()
Reorder layout observations
align_title()
Draw Heatmap rows/columns titles
build_patchwork()
Build Layout object for rendering.
dendrogram_data()
Dengrogram x and y coordinates
geom_draw()
Layer with Grid or Function
GeomDraw ggplot2-ggproto
Base ggproto classes for ggplot2
hclust2()
Generate Tree Structures with Hierarchical Clustering
hmanno()
Determine the context of subsequent manipulations
is.ggheatmap()
Reports whether x is a LayoutHeatmap object
is.ggstack()
Reports whether x is a LayoutStack object
`+`(<Layout>,<ANY>)
Add components to Layout
`&`(<Layout>,<ANY>)
Add components to all plots
layout_heatmap() ggheatmap()
Heatmap layout
layout_stack() ggstack()
Put plots horizontally or vertically
show(<Layout>)
Print Layout object
show(<LayoutHeatmap>)
Show LayoutHeatmap
